TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Unit can use [LINK=PROMOTION_STONE_TOOLS]Stone[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_BRONZE_TOOLS]Bronze[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_IRON_TOOLS]Iron[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_MITHRIL_TOOLS]Mithril[\LINK] and [LINK=PROMOTION_POWER_TOOLS]Power[\LINK] tools, but can't use [LINK=PROMOTION_ENCHANTED_TOOLS]Enchanted tools[\LINK]
